hero_subtitle: Welcome to Fjolla Medika — modern dental care with a gentle touch in the heart of North Macedonia.
about_text_1: Fjolla Medika is a modern dental clinic dedicated to providing high-quality oral care for patients of all ages. Our team of experienced professionals uses the latest technology and techniques to ensure your comfort and satisfaction.
about_text_2: We believe that everyone deserves a healthy, beautiful smile. From routine check-ups to advanced procedures, we are here to help you achieve optimal dental health in a warm and welcoming environment.
about_mission_text: To deliver exceptional dental care with compassion, integrity, and excellence — making every patient feel valued and confident in their smile.
service_1_desc: Comprehensive check-ups, cleanings, fillings, and preventive care to keep your teeth healthy.
service_2_desc: Permanent tooth replacement solutions using state-of-the-art implant technology.
service_3_desc: Braces and aligners to straighten teeth and correct bite issues for all ages.
service_4_desc: Professional whitening treatments to brighten your smile safely and effectively.
service_5_desc: Gentle and friendly dental care designed specifically for children.
service_6_desc: Veneers, bonding, and smile makeovers to enhance the appearance of your teeth.
service_7_desc: Tooth extractions, wisdom teeth removal, and other surgical procedures.
service_8_desc: Root canal treatments to save damaged teeth and relieve pain.
gallery_subtitle: See the transformations our patients have experienced. Real results from real people.
appointment_subtitle: Schedule your visit today. Fill out the form and we'll get back to you shortly.
form_success: Thank you! Your appointment is pending review. We will confirm it shortly.
footer_description: Fjolla Medika — Your trusted dental clinic in North Macedonia. Quality care for the whole family.
